message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for both of us! Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,800 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is still a great price for you, considering the product's worth to you.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,150. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
